feed.title: Effy Li
feed.subtitle: MSc in AI at University of Edinburgh

entry.title: First blog
entry.content:
After three years, finally re-start to write my blog.

Here, I will focus on machine learning and natural language processing. Some things I learned from courses and paper.
Another part is about algorithms and data structure. Probably something I learned from the books or leetcode.
